dcterms:creator: Xin Yao
Chaofeng Huang
Lifeng Sun
dcterms:description: A dataset containing event logs from various sensors used in smart buildings, including occupancy sensors, lights, and HVAC systems, aimed at detecting anomalies.
dcterms:title: Sensors Event Log Dataset

dcterms:creator: Xin Yao
Chaofeng Huang
Lifeng Sun
dcterms:description: A dataset that records the energy consumption of various devices in a smart building, measured in kW/h, used for predicting future energy usage.
dcterms:title: Energy Usage Dataset

dcterms:creator: Xin Yao
Chaofeng Huang
Lifeng Sun
dcterms:description: A dataset obtained from a weather API that includes parameters such as temperature, humidity, and solar radiation, used to enrich the learning model for energy usage prediction.
dcterms:title: Weather API Dataset
